(4,): As a system administrator, I want to add submissions to the system, so that I can manage and track the status of each submission As a system manager, I want to get the status of all files, so that I can monitor the progress and state of submissions in the system As a user, I want to add error messages to submissions, so that I can document issues encountered during the validation process
(2,): As a user, I want to validate submissions, so that I can ensure that they meet the necessary criteria before proceeding As a system, I want to sync data loads, so that I can ensure that all necessary data is refreshed and up-to-date
(0,): As a developer, I want to update validation logic, so that I can refine and enhance the rules used for validating submissions As a FABS user, I want to submit my submissions for validation, so that I can confirm their accuracy and readiness for processing
(5,): As a system, I want to process deletions based on a specified date, so that I can maintain an accurate records history
(3,): As a system, I want to generate a file for validated submissions, so that I can enable downstream processing and reporting
(1,): As a user, I want to update the status of a submission, so that I can reflect changes in its progress through the system
